mean_cn: adj.厌恶人类的，不愿与人来往的
mean_en: believing the worst of human nature and motives; having a sneering disbelief in e.g. selflessness of others
sentence: The little girl is misanthropic and keeps her heart closed to others.
sentence_trans: 小女孩不愿意与人来往，经常封闭自己的内心。
word_etyma: mis恨 ＋ anthrop人 ＋ ic...的 → misanthropic厌恶人类的，厌世的
